modName: No more location markers on the compass
summary: Removes the markers of known and unknown places on the compass
descriptionHtml:
Removes the location markers of discovered and undescovered makers from your compass.

Made as a request from TicklemeFeather

Just place all of these files into your skyrim data folder located

C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Steam\\SteamApps\\common\\skyrim\\Data

or

C:\\Program Files\\Steam\\SteamApps\\common\\skyrim\\Data

For 32 bit systems

There is a patch available for my No enemies on compass mod in the downloads section. Do not download both files, choose one or the other, as the oatch includes both mods.

The original file is not reqired but can be found here:
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=285
author: Arfien

files.name: No more location markers on the compass
